alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 23 at 6:44PM CDT until September 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 5 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Sheboygan, Ozaukee, Milwaukee, Racine and Kenosha Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM CDT this evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Kohler-Andrae State Park Beaches... North Beach in Port Washington... Harrington State Park Beaches... Atwater Beach in Milwaukee... Bradford Beach in Milwaukee... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine... Eichelman Beach in Kenosha...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
